bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, double-butted ORE DT, forged HT/ISCG BB/chainstay yoke/horizontal dropouts, integrated chain tensioner and axle carrier, multispeed hardware, disc only

components.description: RockShox Argyle 302, 80mm, 32mm Cr-Mo stanchions and alloy steerer, 1pc. magnesium lower for 20mm axle, rebound adj., "stiff" coil spring, disc only
FSA PIG FS, 1-1/8" threadless
Specialized aggro, 3D forged/CNC, 4-bolt, 35mm length
Specialized alloy riser bar, 31.8mm, 55mm rise, 680mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 8 degree up
Fuse BMX clamp-on, open end, 136mm
Avid Juicy 4 RSL, hydraulic disc, alloy backed brake pads, adapter and dual-piston caliper w/ 160mm G2 Clean Sweep Rotor
Avid Juicy 3, hydraulic disc, alloy backed brake pads, adapter and dual-piston caliper w/ 160mm G2 Clean Sweep Rotor
Avid Juicy 3
Joy Tech single speed conversion kit, 2 alloy spacers w/ 1/2" x 1/8" x 14t Cr-Mo cog
KMC KOOL K710SL, 1/2" x 1/8"
Fuse SL 2pc., heat treated Sanko Cr-Mo tubular arms, hollow 19mm Cr-Mo spindle
CNC cut 6061, 28t, Motostar design w/ Pattented Wave type engagement
Fuse SL Euro, Alloy threaded cup, 4x cartridge bearing, 6x steel outside adjust spacer
Specialized Lo-Pro Mag II, magnesium body, heat treated 9/16" Cr-Mo spindle, sealed cartridge bearings, 9/16"
Specialized/Alex P.3 Disc, double wall disc w/ eyelets, 32h
Specialized, forged alloy, high/low flange, 36h, 20mm thru axle
Specialized Hi Lo, forged alloy, 4x sealed cartridge bearing, ground race, cassette, nutted with 3/8" axle, 36h
1.8mm (15g) stainless
Specialized Rhythm Lite Control, 26x2.3", 60TPI, aramid bead
Specialized Rhythm Lite Control, 26x2.3", 60TPI, aramid bead
Specialized schraeder valve
Specialized Fuse Lo Pro SL, super light foam, hollow 8mm Cr-Mo rails w/ rail brace tube
Specialized alloy two bolt, no offset, micro adjust, 30.9mm
Integrated w/ replaceable single bolt
Chain stay protector, reflectors, owners manual
